Articles.Content:
This may seem like a silly question, but I cant find anywhere to put my mod! Can someone suggest something please! Curse is not working for me! I will upload the file but it will say''time out'' and stop! Please recommend a place for me to put my mods! Thanks

Edited August 1, 2014 by sumghai
Edited thread title for clarity

That's a rather unusual error.

- Have you placed your add-on in a ZIP archive? (Curse / CurseForge only accepts ZIPs.)

- What sort of internet connection are you on? (A timeout error suggests a connection issue between your computer and the Curse servers.)

- Could you post screenshots of you attempting to upload the file, and any error messages you've encountered?

This may seem like a silly question, but I cant find anywhere to put my mod! Can someone suggest something please! Curse is not working for me! I will upload the file but it will say''time out'' and stop! Please recommend a place for me to put my mods! Thanks

Try KerbalStuff...it's the community's alternative to Cursed. Link is in my sig if you'd like to check it out.

Edit:

Otherwise, there is always Dropbox, Google Drive, Onedrive (was called Skydrive) or any of the free file-hosting services available on the web. Most people who don't use Cursed, GitHub or KerbalStuff use one of these other free alternatives

Edited August 1, 2014 by Ignath
MOAR OPTIONS
There's a sticky for that.
Thanks guys I will definitely try those
